string-array.name: howTo
string-array.item:
1. Type your preferred option 
 2. Type your alternative option 
 3. Pick your move: 
"♦ Rock: Double tap 
♦ Paper: Long press 
♦ Scissors: Fling/Swipe 
" 4. Continue to pick a move until winner is decided

1. Type your tails option
 2. Type your heads option
 3. Tap on the penny to start the flip
 4. Flip the device over onto a flat surface to stop the flip

1. Select how many options you want
 2. Type your options in separately
 3. Jolt/tip the device to roll the dice
 4. Roll again until the dialog box appears revealing the chosen option
